definitions: To remove an item of clothing or an accessory from one's body.
To deduct an amount from a total price or sum.
To remove something from a surface or position.
To have a period of time away from work or duties.
To imitate someone or something, often humorously.
examples: Please take your shoes off at the door.
The store took ten dollars off the price.
He took the picture off the wall.
I need to take some time off next week.
She can really take off her favorite comedian.
